verses.verse: הָיְתָ֣ה <WH1961> become עָלַי֮ <WH5921> and יַד־ <WH3027> The hand יְהוָה֒ <WH3068> of the LORD וַיּוֹצִאֵ֤נִי <WH3318> was upon me and carried me out בְר֙וּחַ֙ <WH7307> in the spirit יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD וַיְנִיחֵ֖נִי <WH5117> and set me down בְּת֣וֹךְ <WH8432> in the midst הַבִּקְעָ֑ה <WH1237> of the valley וְהִ֖יא <WH1931> and it was מְלֵאָ֥ה <WH4392> which [was] full עֲצָמֽוֹת׃ <WH6106> of bones

וְהֶעֱבִירַ֥נִי <WH5674> And caused me to pass עֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <WH5921> among סָבִ֣יב ׀ <WH5439> by them round about סָבִ֑יב <WH5439> about וְהִנֵּ֨ה <WH2009> and behold רַבּ֤וֹת <WH7227> many מְאֹד֙ <WH3966> and behold [there were] very עַל־ <WH5921> among פְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> in the open הַבִּקְעָ֔ה <WH1237> valley וְהִנֵּ֖ה <WH2009> and lo יְבֵשׁ֥וֹת <WH3002> dry מְאֹֽד׃ <WH3966> and lo [they were] very

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> And he said אֵלַ֔י <WH413> to me בֶּן־ <WH1121> unto me Son אָדָ֕ם <WH120> of man הֲתִחְיֶ֖ינָה <WH2421> live הָעֲצָמ֣וֹת <WH6106> can these bones הָאֵ֑לֶּה <WH428> these וָאֹמַ֕ר <WH559> ? And I answered אֲדֹנָ֥י <WH136> O Lord יְהוִ֖ה <WH3069> GOD אַתָּ֥ה <WH859> You יָדָֽעְתָּ׃ <WH3045> thou knowest

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> Again he said אֵלַ֔י <WH413> to me הִנָּבֵ֖א <WH5012> unto me Prophesy עַל־ <WH5921> over הָעֲצָמ֣וֹת <WH6106> upon these bones הָאֵ֑לֶּה <WH428> these וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ <WH559> and say אֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <WH413> about הָעֲצָמוֹת֙ <WH6106> bones הַיְבֵשׁ֔וֹת <WH3002> unto them O ye dry שִׁמְע֖וּ <WH8085> hear דְּבַר־ <WH1697> the word יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

כֹּ֤ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַר֙ <WH559> Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <WH3069> GOD לָעֲצָמ֖וֹת <WH6106> unto these bones הָאֵ֑לֶּה <WH428> to these הִנֵּ֨ה <WH2009> Behold אֲנִ֜י <WH589> I מֵבִ֥יא <WH935> to enter בָכֶ֛ם ר֖וּחַ <WH7307> Behold I will cause breath וִחְיִיתֶֽם׃ <WH2421> into you and ye shall live

וְנָתַתִּי֩ <WH5414> And I will lay עֲלֵיכֶ֨ם <WH5921> and גִּדִ֜ים <WH1517> sinews וְֽהַעֲלֵתִ֧י <WH5927> upon you and will bring up עֲלֵיכֶ֣ם <WH5921> on בָּשָׂ֗ר <WH1320> flesh וְקָרַמְתִּ֤י <WH7159> upon you and cover עֲלֵיכֶם֙ <WH5921> with ע֔וֹר <WH5785> you with skin וְנָתַתִּ֥י <WH5414> and put בָכֶ֛ם ר֖וּחַ <WH7307> breath וִחְיִיתֶ֑ם <WH2421> in you and ye shall live וִידַעְתֶּ֖ם <WH3045> and ye shall know כִּֽי־ <WH3588> that אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I am יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> that I [am] the LORD

וְנִבֵּ֖אתִי <WH5012> So I prophesied כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> I צֻוֵּ֑יתִי <WH6680> as I was commanded וַֽיְהִי־ <WH1961> there was ק֤וֹל <WH6963> there was a noise כְּהִנָּֽבְאִי֙ <WH5012> and as I prophesied וְהִנֵּה־ <WH2009> and behold רַ֔עַשׁ <WH7494> and behold a shaking וַתִּקְרְב֣וּ <WH7126> came together עֲצָמ֔וֹת <WH6106> and the bones עֶ֖צֶם <WH6106> bone אֶל־ <WH413> to עַצְמֽוֹ׃ <WH6106> to his bone

וְרָאִ֜יתִי <WH7200> And when I beheld וְהִנֵּֽה־ <WH2009> and behold עֲלֵיהֶ֤ם <WH5921> and גִּדִים֙ <WH1517> lo the sinews וּבָשָׂ֣ר <WH1320> and the flesh עָלָ֔ה <WH5927> came up וַיִּקְרַ֧ם <WH7159> covered עֲלֵיהֶ֛ם <WH5921> and ע֖וֹר <WH5785> upon them and the skin מִלְמָ֑עְלָה <WH4605> them above וְר֖וּחַ <WH7307> but [there was] no breath אֵ֥ין <WH369> there בָּהֶֽם׃

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> Then said אֵלַ֔י <WH413> to me הִנָּבֵ֖א <WH5012> he unto me Prophesy אֶל־ <WH413> to הָר֑וּחַ <WH7307> unto the wind הִנָּבֵ֣א <WH5012> prophesy בֶן־ <WH1121> son אָ֠דָם <WH120> of man וְאָמַרְתָּ֨ <WH559> and say אֶל־ <WH413> to הָר֜וּחַ <WH7307> to the wind כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֣ר ׀ <WH559> Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִ֗ה <WH3068> GOD מֵאַרְבַּ֤ע <WH702> from the four רוּחוֹת֙ <WH7307> winds בֹּ֣אִי <WH935> Come הָר֔וּחַ <WH7307> O breath וּפְחִ֛י <WH5301> and breathe בַּהֲרוּגִ֥ים <WH2026> upon these slain הָאֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> these וְיִֽחְיֽוּ׃ <WH2421> that they may live

וְהִנַּבֵּ֖אתִי <WH5012> So I prophesied כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> he צִוָּ֑נִי <WH6680> as he commanded וַתָּבוֹא֩ <WH935> came בָהֶ֨ם הָר֜וּחַ <WH7307> me and the breath וַיִּֽחְי֗וּ <WH2421> into them and they lived וַיַּֽעַמְדוּ֙ <WH5975> and stood up עַל־ <WH5921> on רַגְלֵיהֶ֔ם <WH7272> upon their feet חַ֖יִל <WH2428> army גָּד֥וֹל <WH1419> great מְאֹד־ <WH3966> an exceedingly מְאֹֽד׃ <WH3966> an exceedingly ס

וַיֹּאמֶר֮ <WH559> Then he said אֵלַי֒ <WH413> to me בֶּן־ <WH1121> unto me Son אָדָ֕ם <WH120> of man הָעֲצָמ֣וֹת <WH6106> these bones הָאֵ֔לֶּה <WH428> these כָּל־ <WH3605> are the whole בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> are the whole house יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel הֵ֑מָּה <WH1992> like הִנֵּ֣ה <WH2009> behold אֹמְרִ֗ים <WH559> behold they say יָבְשׁ֧וּ <WH3001> are dried עַצְמוֹתֵ֛ינוּ <WH6106> Our bones וְאָבְדָ֥ה <WH6> is lost תִקְוָתֵ֖נוּ <WH8615> and our hope נִגְזַ֥רְנוּ <WH1504> we are cut off לָֽנוּ׃

לָכֵן֩ <WH3651> Therefore הִנָּבֵ֨א <WH5012> Therefore prophesy וְאָמַרְתָּ֜ <WH559> and say אֲלֵיהֶ֗ם <WH413> to כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> Thus אָמַר֮ <WH559> unto them Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִה֒ <WH3069> GOD הִנֵּה֩ <WH2009> Behold אֲנִ֨י <WH589> I פֹתֵ֜חַ <WH6605> I will open אֶת־ <WH853> קִבְרֽוֹתֵיכֶ֗ם <WH6913> your graves וְהַעֲלֵיתִ֥י <WH5927> and cause you to come up אֶתְכֶ֛ם <WH853> מִקִּבְרוֹתֵיכֶ֖ם <WH6913> out of your graves עַמִּ֑י <WH5971> Behold O my people וְהֵבֵאתִ֥י <WH935> and bring אֶתְכֶ֖ם <WH853> אֶל־ <WH413> into אַדְמַ֥ת <WH127> you into the land יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel ס

וִֽידַעְתֶּ֖ם <WH3045> And ye shall know כִּֽי־ <WH3588> that אֲנִ֣י <WH589> I am יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> that I [am] the LORD בְּפִתְחִ֣י <WH6605> when I have opened אֶת־ <WH853> קִבְרֽוֹתֵיכֶ֗ם <WH6913> your graves וּבְהַעֲלוֹתִ֥י <WH5927> and brought you up אֶתְכֶ֛ם <WH853> מִקִּבְרוֹתֵיכֶ֖ם <WH6913> out of your graves עַמִּֽי׃ <WH5971> O my people

וְנָתַתִּ֨י <WH5414> And shall put רוּחִ֤י <WH7307> my spirit בָכֶם֙ וִחְיִיתֶ֔ם <WH2421> in you and ye shall live וְהִנַּחְתִּ֥י <WH3240> and I shall place אֶתְכֶ֖ם <WH853> עַל־ <WH5921> and אַדְמַתְכֶ֑ם <WH127> you in your own land וִידַעְתֶּ֞ם <WH3045> then shall ye know כִּי־ <WH3588> that אֲנִ֧י <WH589> I יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> that I the LORD דִּבַּ֥רְתִּי <WH1696> have spoken וְעָשִׂ֖יתִי <WH6213> [it] and performed נְאֻם־ <WH5002> [it] saith יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD פ
וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> came דְבַר־ <WH1697> The word יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <WH413> to לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> came again unto me saying

וְאַתָּ֣ה <WH859> and you בֶן־ <WH1121> Moreover thou son אָדָ֗ם <WH120> of man קַח־ <WH3947> take לְךָ֙ עֵ֣ץ <WH6086> stick אֶחָ֔ד <WH259> thee one וּכְתֹ֤ב <WH3789> and write עָלָיו֙ <WH5921> on לִֽיהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> upon it For Judah וְלִבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> and for the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel [חֲבֵרֹו כ] (חֲבֵרָ֑יו <WH2270> companion ק) וּלְקַח֙ <WH3947> then take עֵ֣ץ <WH6086> stick אֶחָ֔ד <WH259> another וּכְת֣וֹב <WH3789> and write עָלָ֗יו <WH5921> on לְיוֹסֵף֙ <WH3130> upon it For Joseph עֵ֣ץ <WH6086> the stick אֶפְרַ֔יִם <WH669> of Ephraim וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> and [for] all the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel [חֲבֵרֹו כ] (חֲבֵרָֽיו׃ <WH2270> companion ק)

וְקָרַ֨ב <WH7126> And join אֹתָ֜ם <WH853> אֶחָ֧ד <WH259> them one אֶל־ <WH413> to אֶחָ֛ד <WH259> to another לְךָ֖ לְעֵ֣ץ <WH6086> stick אֶחָ֑ד <WH259> into one וְהָי֥וּ <WH1961> may become לַאֲחָדִ֖ים <WH259> and they shall become one בְּיָדֶֽךָ׃ <WH3027> in thine hand

וְכַֽאֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> after יֹאמְר֣וּ <WH559> shall speak אֵלֶ֔יךָ <WH413> about בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> And when the children עַמְּךָ֖ <WH5971> of thy people לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> unto thee saying הֲלֽוֹא־ <WH3808> not תַגִּ֥יד <WH5046> Wilt thou not shew לָ֖נוּ מָה־ <WH4100> what אֵ֥לֶּה <WH428> another לָּֽךְ׃

דַּבֵּ֣ר <WH1696> Say אֲלֵהֶ֗ם <WH413> to כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> Thus אָמַר֮ <WH559> unto them Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִה֒ <WH3069> GOD הִנֵּה֩ <WH2009> Behold אֲנִ֨י <WH589> I לֹקֵ֜חַ <WH3947> Behold I will take אֶת־ <WH853> עֵ֤ץ <WH6086> the stick יוֹסֵף֙ <WH3130> of Joseph אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which בְּיַד־ <WH3027> which [is] in the hand אֶפְרַ֔יִם <WH669> of Ephraim וְשִׁבְטֵ֥י <WH7626> and the tribes יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel [חֶבְרֹו כ] (חֲבֵרָ֑יו <WH2270> companion ק) וְנָתַתִּי֩ <WH5414> and will put אוֹתָ֨ם <WH853> עָלָ֜יו <WH5921> and אֶת־ <WH854> for עֵ֣ץ <WH6086> them with him [even] with the stick יְהוּדָ֗ה <WH3063> of Judah וַֽעֲשִׂיתִם֙ <WH6213> and make לְעֵ֣ץ <WH6086> stick אֶחָ֔ד <WH259> them one וְהָי֥וּ <WH1961> become אֶחָ֖ד <WH259> and they shall be one בְּיָדִֽי׃ <WH3027> in mine hand

וְהָי֨וּ <WH1961> become הָעֵצִ֜ים <WH6086> And the sticks אֲ‍ֽשֶׁר־ <WH834> which תִּכְתֹּ֧ב <WH3789> whereon thou writest עֲלֵיהֶ֛ם <WH5921> will be in בְּיָדְךָ֖ <WH3027> shall be in thine hand לְעֵינֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH5869> before their eyes

וְדַבֵּ֣ר <WH1696> And say אֲלֵיהֶ֗ם <WH413> to כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> Thus אָמַר֮ <WH559> unto them Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִה֒ <WH3069> GOD הִנֵּ֨ה <WH2009> Behold אֲנִ֤י <WH589> I לֹקֵ֙חַ֙ <WH3947> Behold I will take אֶת־ <WH853> בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel מִבֵּ֥ין <WH996> from among הַגּוֹיִ֖ם <WH1471> the heathen אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> they הָֽלְכוּ־ <WH1980> whither they be gone שָׁ֑ם <WH8033> and I וְקִבַּצְתִּ֤י <WH6908> and will gather אֹתָם֙ <WH853> מִסָּבִ֔יב <WH5439> them on every side וְהֵבֵאתִ֥י <WH935> and bring אוֹתָ֖ם <WH853> אֶל־ <WH413> into אַדְמָתָֽם׃ <WH127> them into their own land

וְעָשִׂ֣יתִי <WH6213> And I will make אֹ֠תָם <WH853> לְג֨וֹי <WH1471> nation אֶחָ֤ד <WH259> them one בָּאָ֙רֶץ֙ <WH776> in the land בְּהָרֵ֣י <WH2022> upon the mountains יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel וּמֶ֧לֶךְ <WH4428> king אֶחָ֛ד <WH259> and one יִֽהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> become לְכֻלָּ֖ם <WH3605> for all לְמֶ֑לֶךְ <WH4428> shall be king וְלֹ֤א <WH3808> will no [יִהְיֶה־ כ] (יִֽהְיוּ־ <WH1961> become עוֹד֙ <WH1961> become ק) לִשְׁנֵ֣י <WH8147> no more two גוֹיִ֔ם <WH1471> nations וְלֹ֨א <WH3808> and no יֵחָ֥צוּ <WH2673> neither shall they be divided ע֛וֹד <WH5750> to them all and they shall be לִשְׁתֵּ֥י <WH8147> into two מַמְלָכ֖וֹת <WH4467> kingdoms עֽוֹד׃ <WH5750> longer
